targets.expr: scalar(ocf_percentage{domain="$domain", device="$cache", category=~"requests", subcategory="rd_hits"}) / (0.001+scalar(ocf_percentage{domain="$domain", device="$cache", category=~"requests", subcategory="rd_total"}))  * 100

scalar(ocf_percentage{domain="$domain", device="$cache", category=~"requests", subcategory="wr_hits"}) /   (0.001+scalar(ocf_percentage{domain="$domain", device="$cache", category=~"requests", subcategory="wr_total"})) * 100

matcher.options: Idle - Waiting for something to happen
Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

list.description: The name of the cache device
list.label: Cache device name
list.name: cache_name

list.description: The disk where the data is first stored
list.label: Fast disk
list.name: fast

list.description: The disk where the data is slowly written
list.label: Slow disk
list.name: slow
